description: This is an HTML source file for a web-based database viewer interface, including embedded CSS and JavaScript for dynamic behavior.

methods.name: loadDatabases
methods.description: Loads the list of databases from the server and populates the sidebar.

methods.name: refreshDatabases
methods.description: Refreshes the database list and resets the UI state.

methods.name: toggleDatabase
methods.description: Toggles the display of tables for a selected database.

methods.name: loadTables
methods.description: Loads tables for the selected database.

methods.name: loadTableData
methods.description: Loads and displays data for a selected table.

methods.name: renderTable
methods.description: Renders data into an HTML table with features like expandable cells.

methods.name: renderCell
methods.description: Renders individual cell content, handling nulls, objects, and long texts.

methods.name: expandCell
methods.description: Expands or collapses cell content when clicked.
